mapper.insert: INSERT INTO POST( POST_NO, EMP_NO, BOARD_NO, TITLE, CATEGORY, CONTENT ) VALUES( POST_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{empNo}, #{boardNo}, #{title}, #{category}, #{content} )
mapper.select: SELECT P.*, H.EMP_NAME, D.DEP_NAME FROM POST P INNER JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON P.BOARD_NO = D.DEP_NO INNER JOIN HR H ON P.EMP_NO = H.EMP_NO WHERE POST_NO = #{no}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM POST WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo} AND IS_DELETED = 'N'

SELECT * FROM (
SELECT ROWNUM RN, T.* FROM (
SELECT P.*, H.EMP_NAME FROM POST P INNER JOIN HR H ON P.EMP_NO = H.EMP_NO WHERE P.BOARD_NO = 1 AND P.IS_DELETED = 'N' ORDER BY P.POST_NO DESC
) T ) WHERE RN BETWEEN 1 AND 5
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REPLY( REPLY_NO, POST_NO, REPLY_FOR, EMP_NO, CONTENT ) VALUES( REPLY_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{postNo}, #{replyFor}, #{empNo}, #{content} )
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM (
SELECT ROWNUM RN, T.* FROM (
SELECT R.*, H.EMP_NAME FROM REPLY R INNER JOIN HR H ON R.EMP_NO = H.EMP_NO WHERE R.POST_NO = #{no} AND R.IS_DELETED = 'N' ORDER BY R.REPLY_NO DESC
) T )
mapper.update: UPDATE REPLY SET IS_DELETED = 'Y' WHERE REPLY_NO = #{replyNo}
